DOC.brief_summary: This drug interaction study evaluate whether blood plasma concentration SSP-002358-base alter SSP-002358 take together omeprazole .
DOC.brief_title: SSP-002358 Drug Interaction Study With Omeprazole
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Age 1855 year inclusive time consent . 2 . Subject willing comply applicable contraceptive requirement protocol : Male , Nonpregnant , nonlactating female Females must least 90 day postpartum nulliparous . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any current recurrent disease ( eg , cardiovascular , renal , liver , gastrointestinal , malignancy condition ) could affect action , absorption , disposition investigational product , could affect clinical laboratory assessment . 2 . Any known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity investigational product omeprazole , closely related compound , state ingredient .
